original_text: From the time that I brought Israel's people out of Egypt until now, I have never lived in a house. While my people moved from place to place, I travelled with them. I lived in a tent as my home.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘 자손을 애굽에서 인도하여 내던 날부터 오늘까지 집에 살지 아니하고 장막과 성막 안에서 다녔나니

sentences.original_text: From the time that I brought Israel's people out of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이스라엘 백성을 이집트에서 인도해 낸 때로부터

sentences.original_text: I have never lived in a house
While my people moved from place to place
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성이 장소에서 장소로 이동하는 동안

sentences.original_text: I lived in a tent as my home
